# Summary

We hope this workshop has helped you to improve your Nextflow workflows. 

If there is anything we can do better or you would like to see supported, 
please let us know by making an issue on our [Github issues page](https://github.com/mahesh-panchal/Nextflow-code-clinic/issues).

If you're in need of further help don't forget to check-out the resources
on the [Nextflow support resources page](nextflow-support-resources.qmd).

Happy coding!
